General.Name: Brüder Mannesmann Aktiengesellschaft
General.Description: Brüder Mannesmann Aktiengesellschaft operates as a management and financial holding company that distributes hand, power, and garden tool items in Germany and internationally. The company offers its products through wholesale and mail order channels. Brüder Mannesmann Aktiengesellschaft was founded in 1750 and is based in Remscheid, Germany.
